Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hp1239 (cell-penetrating; natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: H. petersii (Hp) peptides were derived from a non-amplified cDNA library.Activity:  Active against herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1, EC50=0.41 uM). It also showed activity against intracellular herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) (Hong et al., 2014). Updated 11/2023
Literature Information.Author: Hong W, Li T, Song Y, Zhang R, Zeng Z, Han S, Zhang X, Wu Y, Li W, Cao Z. 2013
Literature Information.Title: Inhibitory activity and mechanism of two scorpion venom peptides against herpes simplex virus type 1.
